name: Star Trek (itch)
description:
A sort of a "tatical top down shoot'em'up" in the Star Trek universe.
It's a fan based game and it won't be commercialized. The rights belongs to their owners.
Control:
Arrows = ship's movement.
Mouse = sight(sensors) and side controls(lcars).
LMB = phasers.
RMB = photon torpedoes.
MMB = toggle shields
'Divert Power' = It greatly increases the efficiency of some area but decreases a little bit all others. (They return to normal configuration by pressing again the activated one).
'Engineering Control' = Like above, they fix one area faster but delay the others. 'Hull' is the most important, if it reaches zero the ship explodes.
